.. _amdgpu_synid8_dst_buf_64:

vdst
===========================

Instruction output: data read from a memory buffer.

*Size:* 2 dwords by default. :ref:`tfe<amdgpu_synid_tfe>` adds 1 dword if specified.

*Operands:* :ref:`v<amdgpu_synid_v>`
